DOC.brief_summary: STUDY DESIGN : This phase 2 , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , efficacy safety study 30 patient erosive osteoarthritis interphalangeal joint . The study compose 4 phase : pre-randomization phase 35 day follow 91-day randomized , double-blind two arm treatment phase , follow 77-day open label treatment phase study participant 28-day observational follow-up phase . Efficacy double blind open label phase assess study day 84 168 treatment start respectively . STUDY DURATION : The study length approximately 231 day individual patient . With approximately 12 month recruitment period study plan last January 2010 July 2011 ( 19 month ) . STUDY OBJECTIVES : The primary objective evaluate 84-day efficacy apremilast 20 mg twice per day [ BID ] , subsequent 7-day dose titration , compare placebo , treatment symptom erosive hand osteoarthritis . Further objective evaluate effect pain , disease activity , structural damage , quality life , safety tolerability .
